item.title: My Certificates
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Organization Course/Certificate Badge Obtained Expiration Certificate AWS AWS Cloud Technical Essentials - - View on Coursera AWS AWS : Migrating to the Cloud - - View on Coursera AWS AWS Fundamentals: Building Serverless Applications - - View on Coursera Linkedin Learning Terraform - - - View on Linkedin Linkedin Continuous Delivery/Continuous Integration - - - View on Linkedin Linkedin Git from Scratch ...GitOps - - - View on Linkedin DevOps on AWS Learn how to use the combination of DevOps philosophies, practices, and tools to develop, deploy, and maintain applications in the AWS Cloud.

item.title: All My Certificates
item.description: AWS Specialization Certificate Description Verification AWS Cloud Technical Essentials Learn how to use several AWS compute services, including Amazon EC2, AWS Lambda, and Amazon ECS View on Coursera AWS : Migrating to the Cloud Learn how to Migrate to the Cloud. It means moving computer stuff to the internet, which can save money and improve performance. View on Coursera AWS Fundamentals: Building Serverless Applications Learn how to build Serverless applications on AWS.
